t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: You can use the Report abuse tool to report inaccurate listing information, violations of Amazon policy, and other issues. To access the tool, log in to Seller Central and use the main menu to select Performance, then Account Health. On the Account Health page, select Report abuse.

t: Support Options and Customer Service - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you need help, our Customer Service is happy to assist you. We also offer a number of self-service options that allow you to solve your issue.

t: Who can create a Brand Store?
Help & Contact Us - Amazon Customer Service
s: Visit the Amazon Customer Service site to find answers to common problems, use online chat, or call customer service phone number at 1-888-280-4331 for support.

t: Get Product Support - Amazon Customer Service
s: Note: The availability of these options varies depending on the item that you purchased. If product support is not available for your item, go to Your Orders to get a refund or a replacement for a damaged, defective, or broken item.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: Transparency protects your brand and customers from counterfeits by ensuring that every unit shipped is authentic. Learn more about Amazon Transparency.

t: How to Contact Amazon Brand Registry | Goat Consulting
s: March 8, 2023 - As the Amazon Brand Registry team does not have phone support, your best way of contacting the Amazon Brand Registry team through a seller central support ticket is through an email opposed to a call with the Seller Central support team.

t: How can I contact the Amazon brand team?
s: Please navigate to the Brand Registry FAQ page. Scroll all the way to the bottom and the last section is "Getting Help." In that section there is a link to contact the Amazon Brand Registry team regarding enrollment and a link to the Brand Registry Support team if you are already enrolled.

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand
s: Amazon IP Accelerator connects you with a network of vetted legal service providers that offer trademark support and other intellectual-property services.

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - This program can help connect you with IP legal service providers that offer trademark-registration services at competitive rates. Brands who use IP Accelerator also get faster access to Brand Registry benefits, which they can enjoy while their trademark application is pending.

t: Support centre | Amazon Ads
s: Bring your brand to life with engaging ways to interact with customers.

t: How To Contact "Brand" support. Seller support hasn't helped
s: This pattern has repeated for the last 2 days. Today, the product got delisted. It took an hour on the phone with support before they said they'd connect me to "Brand" but that "brand" didn't do chat, phone calls, or emails.

t: Amazon Brand Registry – Amazon Seller Brand Registry Services
s: In addition to the protection of your brand, Amazon Brand Registry has a full suite of features to assist brands with better discoverability and improved conversions. Registered sellers can access detailed analytics and other pertinent information to support their sales and provide a better ...

t: Launch your brand with Amazon.in
s: If there are no active Administrators for the brand, there are two ways to request access to the brand: Option 1: If you have at least one other brand that is already enrolled in Brand Registry and you can access the Brand Registry portal, you can submit your request via Brand Registry Support.

t: Amazon Digital Services and Device Support - Amazon Customer Service
s: Need help with your Amazon devices and digital services, including Prime Video, Fire TV, Kindle, Alexa and Echo, Amazon Music, Amazon Games, and Smart Home devices? Visit the Amazon device and digital services help portal to set up your device, troubleshoot issues, or manage your account.

t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: Using the Amazon.com name or branding elements can help you get results. Learn more about our brand use guidelines.

t: Amazon Brand Management | SupplyKick
s: The best partners will intertwine ... optimization services, and even full-service Amazon seller account management. They can help build a strong and trustworthy backing for your brand with high-quality content, customer support plans, and more....

t: Product Support Home
s: You can also get product support for eligible items through Your Orders. Trade-in and save up to 25% on qualifying Amazon devices.
